content: I see that classes on the mathlib documentation list their instances, but it seems that this list is not complete (e.g. I am missing the instance <https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib_docs/algebra/category/Group/limits.html#Group.forget_preserves_limits> in the list of instances of <https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib_docs/category_theory/limits/preserves/basic.html#category_theory.limits.preserves_limit>. Is that expected?
One is docs#category_theory.limits.preserve_limit (which is indeed a structure). The other is docs#category_theory.limits.preserve_limits, which is a bare definition.
Joachim Breitner has marked this topic as resolved.
